document_data.name: Red Pepper
document_data.mainbody: '''Red pepper''', also known as '''chime pepper''' or '''whip pepper''', was a vegetable found throughout [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Description: Red peppers were quite common and a versatile mild tasting vegetable. When dried and crushed, it was used as a flavorful spice, often used as a base for many [[stew]]s across the Realms.
document_data.Availability:
In the [[Western Heartlands]], red peppers could be found across the trade ways, in taverns, and villages of the region.

[[Amruthar]]'s markets in [[Thay]] were stocked with the widest variety of [[pepper]]s of all shapes and sizes, including the mild-flavored red peppers.
document_data.Usages:
In [[Selgaunt]], [[Sembia]], red pepper [[oil]] was used for frying.

[[Chessenta]]'s simple on the road meals often included skewers of red peppers, [[chicken]], and [[mushroom]]s, roasted on the campfire.
